## White Alert - MIND FLAYER
[italic]Called by: Anyone with Command-Level Access at a working Communications Console.[/italic]
[bold]Conditions[/bold]
Glimmer levels have raised above 450 units, or a rogue Psionic entity.
[bold]Security:[/bold]
Random searches are fully permitted and recommended in order to locate any probers.
Security personnel are to cooperate with the Mantis in order to locate any Psionics.
[bold]General Crew:[/bold]
All personnel are to maximize their Suit Sensors.
All personnel are to report any psionic activity to Security or the Mantis.
[bold]Science:[/bold]
All scientific research is to be suspended, all anomalies killed and artifacts secured.
Mantis personnel are to be given access to the station in order to locate and contain any Psionics.
